int16.name: trailing edge shape offset
int16.description: zero places the shape exactly on the trailing edge, positive numbers push it off the edge

int16.name: width
int16.description: flag size from attached to trailing edge

int16.name: height
int16.description: flag size along the direction of attachment (should be odd)

float32.name: cell width
float32.description: width of the cell between each pair of vertices

float32.name: cell height
float32.description: height of the cell between each pair of vertices

reflexive.name: attachment points
reflexive.description: attachment points determine where the flag is attached

int16.name: height_to_next_attachment
int16.description: flag vertices between this attachment point and the next
